attributes.action: Immediately scrap ALL government green levy's on households and businesses.
attributes.additional_details: The CEO of TATA this week said that the UKs competitive position is degraded by the imposition of green levy's which are not imposed by our direct competitors (despite we are all in the 'big society' of the EU together - despite the absolute disgust of the majority of UK citizens at this abomination) so the question must be asked WHY ARE WE PAYING TO REDUCE THE CARBON GASSES WHEN OUR CLOSEST NEIGHBOURS ARE NOT BOTHERING?  WHEN THE WORLD IMPLODES BECAUSE OF GREEN HOUSE GASSES WE WILL ALL GO AT THE SAME TIME BUT BECAUSE OF OUR LUDICROUS POLITICAL ELITE, WE WILL ALL HAVE SUFFERED MORE WHILE WE WAIT FOR IT TO HAPPEN.
